newsitem.title: ZAIRE: Zaire acknowledges fall of Moba.
newsitem.headline: Zaire acknowledges fall of Moba.

text.p: Zaire's Defence Ministry on Tuesday acknoweldged that rebels had captured the southern town of Moba in the copper-rich province of Shaba, extending the territory they control by a further 200 km (125 miles) south.

"They took Moba on Sunday. At present I have no more information on the fall of the town," a senior defence ministry official told Reuters. Moba is on the banks of Lake Tanganyika and is deep into the province of Shaba.
